contentList.content: Expert Assassin
You know the skills every good assassin has picked up. You are an expert infiltrator.
Master Thief
You've mastered all the skills a thief can learn. Your sneaking skills are considered supreme.
Rogue Imposter
The world may mistake you for a rogue but deep down, you know you aren't one. Your actions have a certain cunning to them.
Uncivilized
You think you're a barbarian, you are...but not the kind you want to be.
Serial Killer
You once saw a tiefling slaughtering her way through enemies, you tried to imitate her but failed.
Delusional
You pretend to be an animal when you're angry...and it works. You can speak to animals.
Tone-deaf Bard
You can just barely convince someone you are a bard.
Novice Cleric
You know some basic things about being a cleric.
Novice Fighter
You have picked up some basic knowledge related to combat.
Veteran Fighter
You were seasoned through blood and battle, you walk through battlefields with an air of confidence.
Godless Paladin
You call yourself a Paladin but you've never taken an oath. You emit an aura of protection, courage...and hate.
Novice Ranger
You've picked up the basic skills of being a ranger.
Adept Stalker
You are proficient in the art of stalking prey.
Adept Hunter
You are proficient in hunting prey.
Apex Predator
Your prey always end up dead and few things can escape from you.
Competent Spellcaster
You can differentiate friend from foe unlike some other spellcasters.
Seer
Occasionally, you catch a glimpse of the future and predict your opponent's actions.
Elemental Lord
You may not hold absolute dominion over the elements but they bend before your will, the elements almost seem to hesitate before you. Gain resistance to Fire, Cold, Lightning and Thunder damage.
Insightful Spellcaster
You've learned to manipulate spells to a higher degree.
Outer Gods' Servant
You've made a pact with something powerful and unknown, possibly outside of reality itself.
Timeworn Paladin

You swore an oath long ago, all who can attest to it are gone and your god has long been silent. Only you know if your faith remains strong but those around you can perceive an aura of devotion and are warded from spells.
Shapeshifter
You may be mistaken for a druid but a druid you most certaintly are not.
Impatient Monk
The life of a monk was not one you were cut out for but that doesn't mean you learnt nothing. You've embraced the shadows and gained total control of yourself during combat.
Descendant of Dragons
The blood of a dragon runs through your veins.
Conjurer
You've dabbled in the arts of conjuration and call yourself a wizard.
Mind Master
Your mind is your most important asset, you've mastered it and made it a fortress.
Stormborn
There is a certain calm that washes over you during a storm, as if it's welcoming you home.
Tainted
Your bloodline is one that has been sullied by fey energies.
Eldritch Worshipper
You have made a pact with some unknown entity residing in the Far Realm.
Student of Undeath
You have always found the dead to be both better company and more interesting than the living.
Mortal Instrument
You have great power granted from your patron, their goals likely destructive...but such things are not your concern.
Shaolin Monk
You have mastered mind, body, soul and fist.
Swordsinger
Your title had no relation to your skill with the sword, you meant it to be a bit more literal, a bard with a blade.
Wordweaver
You spin tales and weave words to your liking.
Witness of Heroes
You wander the land to witness and keep alive the deeds and memories of the mighty.
Lunar Druid
You are sworn to the moon and can draw on its power to transform yourself.
Fungal Druid
You manipulate spores to augment yourself and harm your foes.
Unstable Sorcerer
Your powers come from ancient forces of chaos, they churn within you, waiting to burst free at any time.
Transmigrator
Your soul is not native to this universe or even this body, inexplicably, none seem to be the wiser. Fortunately, you seem to have assimilated the skills and memories of your host.
Reincarnator
How many lives you have lived, how much you have experienced, only you know.
Regressor
A dream? A hallucination? Haven't you been through this before? At least you remember your past experiences..or are they future ones?
Enigmatic Harbinger
Something beyond your comprehension has bestowed upon you the power to smite your foes. No oaths to be sworn, it only seeks amusement.
